divs: sighting detailsi reported a event on 2\12\2007 @ 8:21 p.m. in the southern calif. desert at the salton sea. i do not know how to contact you after the fact ? i was asked to fill out a questionair some time later but it was deleted . i am interested in following up on this and would like to stay in contact with your organization . please contact me at the info given above . thank you , ed winters e-mail = geebeeair@msn.com (760) 395 5902 = home (760) 608 1746 = cell
